NEWS(1) User Commands NEWS(1)

NAME

news - print news items

SYNOPSIS

news [-a] [-n] [-s] [items]

DESCRIPTION

The news command prints files from the systems news directory that have been added or modified since its previous invocation, preceded by a header, starting with the most recent file.
It accepts the following options:
-a
Print all files in the system news directory. The recorded time of the previous invocation is not changed.
-n
Print only the names of added or modified files. The recorded time of the previous invocation is not changed.
-s
Print only the count of added or modified files. The recorded time of the previous invocation is not changed.

ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES

HOME
User's home directory.

FILES

$HOME/.news_time
The time of the previous invocation is recorded as the modification time of this file.
/var/news
System news directory.
4/17/03 Heirloom Toolchest
